scripts.dev: npx prisma generate --schema prisma/schema2.prisma && node --watch --env-file=.env src/server.js
scripts.dc:up: docker compose up -d && docker compose logs -f prisma_app
scripts.setup:prisma_app: npx prisma generate --schema prisma/schema.prisma && npx prisma migrate deploy --schema prisma/schema.prisma && npx prisma db push --schema prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.setup:prisma_tests: npx prisma generate --schema prisma/schema2.prisma && npx prisma migrate deploy --schema prisma/schema2.prisma && npx prisma db push --schema prisma/schema2.prisma
